languages.text: Отряд отважно двинулся вперед, в царство слепящей белизны и трескучего мороза. Вскоре небо затянули снежные клубящиеся облака, сокрывшие свет звезды. Воющий, словно свора голодных духов, ветер скрыл все следы и поднял яростный буран.

The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.
languages.original_text: Отряд отважно двинулся вперед, в царство слепящей белизны и трескучего мороза. Вскоре небо затянули снежные клубящиеся облака, сокрывшие свет звезды. Воющий, словно свора голодных духов, ветер скрыл все следы и поднял яростный буран.

traits.locale_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

languages.text: 一行人无畏前行，来到了满是白雪与冰霜的冰冷世界。积雪云很快就盖住了天空，遮住了群星的光芒。狂风呼啸着，如一群饥饿的幽灵一般，卷走了所有的足迹，掀起了滔天暴雪。
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: 一行人无畏前行，来到了满是白雪与冰霜的冰冷世界。积雪云很快就盖住了天空，遮住了群星的光芒。狂风呼啸着，如一群饥饿的幽灵一般，卷走了所有的足迹，掀起了滔天暴雪。

languages.text: 一行は勇敢にも、危険を承知で前の見えない白銀と、ひび割れた霜の世界に向かって前進する。間もなく空は雪雲で覆われ、星明かりも遮られる。群れの飢えた魂のようなうなり声を上げながら、風はあらゆる痕跡を吹き飛ばし、恐ろしい嵐をあおり立てる。
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: 一行は勇敢にも、危険を承知で前の見えない白銀と、ひび割れた霜の世界に向かって前進する。間もなく空は雪雲で覆われ、星明かりも遮られる。群れの飢えた魂のようなうなり声を上げながら、風はあらゆる痕跡を吹き飛ばし、恐ろしい嵐をあおり立てる。

languages.text: El grupo se aventura hacia el reino del blanco cegador y la escarcha crepitante. El cielo pronto se cubre de nubes de nieve que bloquean la luz de las estrellas. El viento, que aúlla como una jauría de espíritus hambrientos, barre todas las huellas y desata una tormenta enajenada.
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: El grupo se aventura hacia el reino del blanco cegador y la escarcha crepitante. El cielo pronto se cubre de nubes de nieve que bloquean la luz de las estrellas. El viento, que aúlla como una jauría de espíritus hambrientos, barre todas las huellas y desata una tormenta enajenada.

languages.text: Le groupe s'aventure courageusement dans un monde d'un blanc aveuglant et de givre qui craque sous leurs pas. Pour ne rien arranger, le ciel se couvre bientôt de nuages de neige qui masquent la lumière de l'étoile. Le vent, hurlant comme une meute d'esprits affamés, efface toutes les traces et soulève une violente tempête.
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: Le groupe s'aventure courageusement dans un monde d'un blanc aveuglant et de givre qui craque sous leurs pas. Pour ne rien arranger, le ciel se couvre bientôt de nuages de neige qui masquent la lumière de l'étoile. Le vent, hurlant comme une meute d'esprits affamés, efface toutes les traces et soulève une violente tempête.

languages.text: Die Gruppe macht sich auf den Weg, hinein ins blendende Weiß und den eisigen Frost. Bald ist der Himmel voller Schneewolken, die das Licht der Sonne blockieren. Der Wind heult wie ein Rudel hungriger Geister, verweht alle Spuren und bringt einen wütenden Sturm mit sich.
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: Die Gruppe macht sich auf den Weg, hinein ins blendende Weiß und den eisigen Frost. Bald ist der Himmel voller Schneewolken, die das Licht der Sonne blockieren. Der Wind heult wie ein Rudel hungriger Geister, verweht alle Spuren und bringt einen wütenden Sturm mit sich.

languages.text: Grup, kör edici beyazlık ve dondurucu soğuğun hükmettiği diyarda cesurca ilerliyor. Kısa bir süre sonra gökyüzü, yıldızın ışığını gölgeleyen kar bulutlarıyla kaplanıyor. Hücuma geçmiş aç ruhlar gibi uğuldayan rüzgâr, öfkeli bir fırtınayla tüm izleri silip süpürüyor.
languages.original_text: The group bravely ventures onward, into the realm of blinding white and crackling frost. The sky is soon blanketed with snow clouds that block out the star's light. The wind, howling like a pack of hungry spirits, sweeps away all tracks and whips up a furious storm.

traits.locale_text: Grup, kör edici beyazlık ve dondurucu soğuğun diyarında cesurca ilerledi. Kısa bir süre sonra gökyüzü, yıldızın ışığını gölgeleyen kar bulutlarıyla kaplandı. Aç ruhlardan oluşmuş bir sürü gibi uğuldayan rüzgâr, öfkeli bir fırtınayla tüm izleri silip süpürdü.
